name: match_margins
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool basketball_data. Tool description: Broadage Basketball API can deliver any type of data for a basketball match, tournament or team; including livescores, play-by-play, boxscore, match statistics & many more. Our Basketball Coverage includes 100+ tournaments from all around the world with in-depth coverage, giving you the opportunity to present the best sports data to users located anywhere.
This is a limited version in RapidApi. Please, click here to start your Free Trial and try the endpoints with live data now! API description: Fetches the average match margin statistics for a given team using the provided RapidAPI key.

teamid.description: The ID of the team for which to fetch the match margin statistics.
